name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickCSV - Add, Manage and Download Tasks in CSV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple app to add items, manage them, and download as CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickCSV makes it easy to organize and track your items. You can quickly add tasks, lists, or notes, and download them as a CSV file when needed. The interface is simple, and your lists stay safe across sessions, making it convenient to manage everything at any time.

Whether you’re handling personal tasks or work projects, QuickCSV helps you stay organized. It’s a straightforward tool designed to keep things efficient and accessible, ensuring you have everything you need in one place. Stay on top of your tasks with QuickCSV!
